attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2012-1007

Date: 2012-07-26

 Whereas vacancies exist in the officer

establishment numbers within the Royal Canadian Mounted

Police, the maximum number of which, in each rank, is

prescribed by the Treasury Board pursuant to subsection 6(2)

of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Act;

 

 Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General

in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of

Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness,

 

(a) pursuant to paragraph 6(3)(a) of the Royal Canadian

Mounted Police Act, appoints the members of the Royal

Canadian Mounted Police named in the annexed

schedule to the rank of Inspector; and

 

(b) pursuant to paragraph 6(3)(b) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Act, authorizes the issue of a Commission under the Great Seal of Canada to the members referred to in paragraph (a).

 


Attendu qu = il existe des vacances au sein de l = effectif des officiers de la Gendarmerie royale du Canada, dont le nombre maximal de chaque grade est fixé par le Conseil du Trésor en vertu du paragraphe 6(2) de la Loi sur la Gendarmerie royale du Canada,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Sécurité publique et de la Protection civile, Son Excellence

le Gouverneur général en conseil :

 

a) en vertu de l = alinéa 6(3)a) de la Loi sur la Gendarmerie royale du Canada, nomme au grade d = inspecteur les membres de la Gendarmerie royale du Canada dont le nom figure à l = annexe ci-jointe;

 

b) en vertu de l = alinéa 6(3)b) de la Loi sur la Gendarmerie royale du Canada, autorise l = émission d = une commission sous le grand sceau du Canada aux membres visés à l = alinéa a).

 


SCHEDULE

 

ROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE ACT

 

 

APPOINTMENT

 

 

Staff Sergeant John Edward Joseph Bennett

Staff Sergeant Patricia Marie MacCormack

Staff Sergeant Ronald Patrick Makar

Staff Sergeant Kevin Myles Murray

Staff Sergeant Shirley Clare Steele

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


ANNEXE

 

LOI SUR LA GENDARMERIE ROYALE DU CANADA

 

 

NOMINATION

 

 

Sergent d’état-major John Edward Joseph Bennett

Sergente d’état-major Patricia Marie MacCormack

Sergent d’état-major Ronald Patrick Makar

Sergent d’état-major Kevin Myles Murray

Sergente d’état-major Shirley Clare Steele

PC Number: 2012-1007Date: 2012-07-26


	 Whereas vacancies exist in the officer 


establishment numbers within the Royal Canadian Mounted 


Police, the maximum number of which, in each rank, is 


prescribed by the Treasury Board pursuant to subsection 6(2) 


of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Act;


 


	 Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General 


in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of 


Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness,


 


(a) pursuant to paragraph 6(3)(a) of the Royal Canadian 


Mounted Police Act, appoints the members of the Royal 


Canadian Mounted Police named in the annexed 


schedule to the rank of Inspector; and


 


(b) pursuant to paragraph 6(3)(b) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Act, authorizes the issue of a Commission under the Great Seal of Canada to the members referred to in paragraph (a).
